title.narrative: Increasing Social Sector Thought Leadership: A Civil Society Outreach Strategy

description.narrative:
Aligned with our aim to strengthen the capacity of global civil society leaders, InterAction will undertake an outreach initiative that will raise the awareness of the Bellagio Residency program among social sector practitioners around the world. The Bellagio Residency program offers the opportunity for leaders to reflect on their role in social change; by offering the asset of the program to a broader range of participants we can move forward a related InterAction goal of strengthening civil society's thought leadership.
InterAction will lead and coordinate an outreach initiative targeting eligible individuals by tapping leaders in our member organizations, partner networks, and engaging past program participants from the social sector. The outreach awareness building efforts will result in a demonstrable increase in the program's quantity, quality, and geographic spread of residency applications from this target audience.
Additionally, our related objective is to increase awareness and raise the profile of the Bellagio Residency program among civil society networks around the world. This effort also includes providing the Bellagio Center program with guidance on attracting transformative leaders within the social sector.
Note: We publish the award notification date as the transaction date. If this data is missing, the transaction date defaults to the start date of the activity
